allow: Bash(for branch in experiment/exp000-baseline-100runs experiment/exp100-muon-test experiment/exp310-lookahead-param-sweep)
Bash(do echo '=== Checking $branch ===' git checkout $branch if grep -n 'lambda i: lr_schedule\[i\]' airbench94.py)
Bash(then echo '  âš  Found potential issue' sed -i 's/lambda i: lr_schedule\[i\]/lambda i: lr_schedule[min(i, len(lr_schedule) - 1)]/g' airbench94.py git diff airbench94.py)
